projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.stack: React, TypeScript, OpenWeather API, Tailwind CSS
projects.description: A responsive weather application that fetches real-time data from OpenWeather API. Features include location search, hourly forecasts, and weather alerts.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration. Includes admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team workspaces, and progress tracking. Supports drag-and-drop kanban boards.

projects.title: Botanical Illustration Series
projects.description: A collection of detailed botanical illustrations featuring wildflowers and native plants. Each piece combines traditional drawing techniques with digital enhancement.

projects.title: Brand Identity Design
projects.description: Complete brand identity package including logo design, color palette, typography guidelines, and brand standards document for a sustainable fashion startup.

projects.title: Interactive Motion Graphics
projects.description: Series of animated explainer videos and interactive motion graphics for web and social media. Includes seamless looping animations and micro-interactions.
